p_64: Dashes ("-") indicate data for a particular field are not provided for this program in Residency Explorer. Reasons why data are not being provided can vary (e.g., they are not reported or available, they are not applicable, or they are based on an insufficient number of people for reporting purposes).

th_99: # of Residents Who Were Graduates of a Joint MD-PhD program
p_102: As a tight-knit program with the large patient referral base and resources of a quaternary-care medical center, our residency offers four trainees per residency year the opportunity to prepare for careers as radiologists. Work directly with attending faculty using state-of-the-art technology, become proficient in both procedural and interpretive skills and conduct research with faculty mentors.
